body.name: DA_RTL_STR_CHANNEL_INST
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_RTL_STR_CHANNEL_INST
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.15.055336000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,sales_outlet_loc_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_rtl_str_channel_inst.add(fx), parms=' || sales_outlet_loc_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_rtl_str_channel_inst a
(
a.rtl_channel_instance_id
,a.sales_outlet_loc_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_rtl_channel_instance_id.NEXTVAL
,add.sales_outlet_loc_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.rtl_channel_instance_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_rtl_str_channel_inst.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,sales_outlet_loc_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_rtl_str_channel_inst.add, parms=' || sales_outlet_loc_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_rtl_str_channel_inst a
(
a.rtl_channel_instance_id
,a.sales_outlet_loc_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_rtl_channel_instance_id.NEXTVAL
,add.sales_outlet_loc_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_rtl_str_channel_inst.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,rtl_channel_instance_id IN NUMBER
,sales_outlet_loc_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_rtl_str_channel_inst.add, parms=' || rtl_channel_instance_id || '|' || sales_outlet_loc_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_rtl_str_channel_inst a
(
a.rtl_channel_instance_id
,a.sales_outlet_loc_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.rtl_channel_instance_id
,add.sales_outlet_loc_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_rtl_str_channel_inst.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,rtl_channel_instance_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_rtl_str_channel_inst.del, parms=' || rtl_channel_instance_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_rtl_str_channel_inst a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.rtl_channel_instance_id = del.rtl_channel_instance_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_rtl_str_channel_inst.del');

END del;

END da_rtl_str_channel_inst;
